formatDescription:
Ogg is a free, open container format maintained by the Xiph.Org Foundation. The Ogg container format can multiplex a number of independent streams for audio, video, text, and metadata.

Theora is a free, lossy video compression format also developed by the Xiph.Org Foundation.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: Ogg Theora Video variant 1
internalSignatures.note: Ogg Page header: Capture pattern (“OggS”); stream structure revision (00h); flag: 1st page of a logical bitstream (02h) {22} '€theora' identifier, Major version 0x03, Minor version 0x02, Revision version 0x01 {32} next Ogg Page.

internalSignatures.name: Ogg Theora Video variant 2
internalSignatures.note: Ogg Page Skeleton header (with 'fishead\0' identifier), followed by Capture pattern (“OggS”); stream structure revision (00h); flag: 1st page of a logical bitstream (02h) {22} '€theora' identifier, Major version 0x03, Minor version 0x02, Revision version 0x01 {32} next Ogg Page.
